title: Feature Request: Using local devices in Remote session
author: itagagaki
body_snippet:
On mRemoteNG Version 1.76.20.24615 with Windows 10 (x64),
I can't join a web conference on a remote PC with a webcam or headset on a local PC.

This is possible with the Microsoft Remote Desktop client for Windows. It allows us to select the devices and resources on the local PC to use for the remote session, and there is also a choice of video capture device.

It would be very nice to be able to do that with mRemoteNG as well.

iterations.description: Feature request to expose RDP device redirection settings (local drives, printers, ports, smart cards) in connection properties UI via MsRdpClient AdvancedSettings.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to expose RDP device redirection settings (local drives, printers, ports, smart cards) in connection properties UI via MsRdpClient AdvancedSettings.
Approach: Add device redirection properties (RedirectDrives, RedirectPrinters, RedirectPorts, RedirectSmartCards, RedirectClipboard) to ConnectionInfo and wire them to MsRdpClientAdvancedSettings in the RDP protocol handler, then expose checkboxes in the connection properties UI panel.
